name: make_api_request
description:
Unified tool for all Square API operations. Be sure to get types before calling. Available services:
  applepay, bankaccounts, bookingcustomattributes, bookings, cards, cashdrawers, catalog, checkout, customercustomattributes, customergroups, customersegments, customers, devices, disputes, events, giftcardactivities, giftcards, inventory, invoices, labor, locationcustomattributes, locations, loyalty, merchantcustomattributes, merchants, oauth, ordercustomattributes, orders, payments, payouts, refunds, sites, snippets, subscriptions, team, terminal, vendors, webhooksubscriptions.

request.description: The request object for the API call.

name: get_type_info
description: Get type information for a Square API method. You must call this before calling the make_api_request tool.

name: get_service_info
description: Get information about a Square API service. Call me before trying to get type info
